serial_number_warning: Please note, that serial number could be easily changed, so it should never be used for security
position_sensor_calibration_confirm: Are you sure to calibrate position sensor?
calibration_warning_description: During calibration motor will rotate very fast!
calibration_warning_recomendation: Remove the chain from the front gear and ensure that bike installed safely and cranks nor gear will not hit anything when rotating!
erase_service_mileage_confirm: Are you sure to clean mileage since last service record?
set_time_confirm: Are you sure to set new time on display clock?
time_not_chosen: Time in input form is not chosen
code_no_description: Description for this code is not available
error_code_8_description: Inner motor hall sensor (not speed hall sensor) error
error_code_8_recommendations: Check cable connection (for motorwheels), replace motor, try repair motor with disassembling if you are electronics specialist
error_code_14_recommendations: Check connection with motor. If its overheated, let it cool down. Check if motor has supply. Check contacts in connectors for dirt and damage.
error_code_21_recommendations: Check magnet on wheel. Check connection with of hall sensor. Check hall sensor with multimeter. Try to connect spare sensor if available.
speed_limit_description: Its illegal to set speed limit bigger than 25km/h
wheel_diameter_description: NEVER try to set wrong wheel diameter - its illegal, because it can lead to incorrect speed measurement
parameter_writing_confirm: Are you sure that you want to write all parameters on device?
current_limit_description: Be very careful with this parameter! Too big value may burn engine!
high_voltage_limit_description: Controller will show overvoltage error when this limit is reached
low_voltage_limit_under_load_description: Controller will stop motor when this limit is reached under load (during riding) to protect battery from overdischarge
idle_low_voltage_limit_description: Controller will not launch motor motor when this limit is reached without load to protect battery from overdischarge
cadence_sensor_signal_number: Signals per rotation from cadence sensor
throttle_start_voltage_description: Voltage from throttle lever on minimum power (not on zero power! on this level engine starts to work)
throttle_max_voltage_description: Voltage from throttle lever on maximum power
field_empty: This field should not be empty
responsibility_disclaimer_error: Developer does not carry any responsibility
law_disclaimer_text_1: I checked local laws and regulations and
law_disclaimer_text_2: will not use this program to violate them
liability_disclaimer_text_1: I understand, that developer of this software
liability_disclaimer_text_2: do not care responsibility for any consequences
liability_disclaimer_text_3: of changing configuration of e-bike or any other device
max_current_description: Note, that Voltage*Max Current is a maximal power, but not nominal. If you have legal motor certified as 250W, and Voltage*Max Current is twice or even triple bigger its normal - 250W is a nominal (continuous) power, and its legal to use device that can have bigger maximal power. For example, some of Shimano STEPS motors that certified for 250W pedelecs have 600W of max power.
battery_low_limit_description: Increase it if you system shuts down unexpectedly by BMS inside of battery
wheel_diameter_warning: Usually bike wheels has size in range from 12 to 29 inches
pedal_speed_limit_description: Note that its illegal to set bigger speed limit that its allowed in your country. Check your local laws before changing it
start_degree_description: This parameter means on how big angle do you have to turn pedals to start motor
stop_delay_simplified_description: This parameter means time between last signal from pedal sensor and motor stop. If parameter is too low, motor may work unstable on low cadence. If parameter is too big, braking distance will increase (so too big value is not available in Simplified mode)
battery_low_limit_warning: Its not recommended to set low voltage battery protection lower than %{min}V and higher that %{max}V on your system
throttle_start_voltage_warning: Its not recommended to set lower start voltage than 1.1V
